topic.title: Return from Bypass 1 to Static Mode

li.p:
Make Source 1 active:
Remove Source 1 Key from top Kirk-Key block on top of dead-front panel.
Insert Source 1 Key into S1 lock on Source 1 MCCB.
Turn S1 Key to open lock on Source 1 MCCB.
Close Source 1 MCCB.
Verify that Source 1 is active: check the one-line image on the STS Monitor (Home screen) to verify that SCR 1 (Source 1) is the active path. DO NOT PROCEED IF SOURCE 1 IS NOT ACTIVE! You will drop the load when you deactivate Bypass Source 1.

Turn OFF Bypass Source 1:
Open (turn OFF) Bypass Source 1 MCCB.
Turn key in Bypass Source 1 to lock open.
Remove key from Bypass Source 1 MCCB lock.
Insert key into Bypass Source 1 position in top Kirk-Key blocks on dead front panel.
Turn key to retract locking bar.

Make Source 2 active:
Remove Source 2 key from Source 2 key position in top key blocks in dead front panel.
Insert key into Source 2 MCCB lock.
Turn key to retract locking bar.
Close S2 MCCB.

body.p: STS is now in Static Mode.
